item.description: My troupe, Active Ingredients, will be performing at Improv Boston's Open Comedy Jam. Performing with me are people you might recognize from Incubator including, Nikki Frankel and Doug Fitzgerald. It will be a great show with some other troupes and standups. In addition, this is an opportunity for all of you to jump up on stage in the second half of the show as they allow audience members to come up and participate. Tickets are only $5.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet inside lobby; I will come out after my show and meet everyone.
item.name: Active Ingredients at IB's Open Comedy Jam
